Package com.itesm.AmazonRHS.Equipo4DB.Services

Class EmployeeService

java.lang.Object
com.itesm.AmazonRHS.Equipo4DB.Services.EmployeeService
@Service public class EmployeeService extends Object
EmployeeService is a class that works with employeeRepository to manage its data in order to accomplish the necessary operations for the controllers

  • Method Details

    • createEmployee

      public EmployeeDTO createEmployee(EmployeeDTO employeeDTO)
      Creates an Employee in the Database. This method receives an EmployeeDTO and depending on its role it configures the Employee that will be store in the Employee table
      Parameters:
      employeeDTO - An Object containing all the information of the Employee that will be store
      Returns:
      All the information of the new Employee in a EmployeeDTO Object

    • getSupervisorAgents

      public Iterable<EmployeeDTO> getSupervisorAgents(EmployeeDTO sup)
      Retrieves all the agents assigned to a specific Supervisor
      Parameters:
      sup - The EmployeeDTO containing the Supervisor information
      Returns:
      An Iterable with all the supervisor's agents in EmployeeDTO Objects

    • signIn

      public User signIn(String email)
      Checks if some user credentials exist in the SignIn index from the Employee table
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the wanted user
      Returns:
      The user if the credentials exist or null if they do not

    • getNotAssignAgents

      public Iterable<EmployeeDTO> getNotAssignAgents()
      Retrieves all the agents that are not assigned to a Supervisor
      Returns:
      An Iterable with all the not assigned agents in EmployeeDTO Objects

    • getEmployees

      public Iterable<EmployeeDTO> getEmployees()
      Get all the employees that are currently in the Employee table
      Returns:
      An Iterable with all the employees in EmployeeDTO Objects

    • getManagers

      public Iterable<EmployeeDTO> getManagers()
      Get all the managers in the Employee table
      Returns:
      An Iterable with all the managers in EmployeeDTO Objects

    • getAgents

      public Iterable<EmployeeDTO> getAgents()
      Get all the agents in the Employee table
      Returns:
      An Iterable with all the agents in EmployeeDTO Objects

    • getSupervisors

      public Iterable<EmployeeDTO> getSupervisors()
      Get all the supervisors in the Employee table
      Returns:
      An Iterable with all the supervisors in EmployeeDTO Objects

    • getOne

      public EmployeeDTO getOne(String role, String employeeId)
      Looks for a specific employee in the Employee table and returns it as a EmployeeDTO
      Parameters:
      role - The role of the employee wanted in a String variable
      employeeId - The unique id of the employee wanted in a String variable
      Returns:
      If the employee actually exists, the return will be a EmployeeDTO with the information of it, otherwise the return will be null

    • deleteEmployee

      public Boolean deleteEmployee(String role, String employeeId)
      Deletes an employee from the Employee table
      Parameters:
      role - The role of the employee wanted in a String variable
      employeeId - The unique id of the employee wanted in a String variable

    • updateManager

      public EmployeeDTO updateManager(EmployeeDTO employee)
      Updates the attributes of a manager in the Employee table
      Parameters:
      employee - The EmployeeDTO will all the new information of the manager
      Returns:
      An EmployeeDTO with the manager information updated

    • updateSupervisor

      public EmployeeDTO updateSupervisor(EmployeeDTO employee)
      Updates the attributes of a supervisor in the Employee table
      Parameters:
      employee - The EmployeeDTO will all the new information of the supervisor
      Returns:
      An EmployeeDTO with the supervisor information updated

    • updateAgent

      public EmployeeDTO updateAgent(EmployeeDTO employee)
      Updates the attributes of an agent in the Employee table
      Parameters:
      employee - The EmployeeDTO will all the new information of the agent
      Returns:
      An EmployeeDTO with the agent information updated

    • existID

      public Boolean existID(String role)
      Verifies if there are employees from a specific role in the Employee table
      Parameters:
      role - A String variable with the role that will be searched in the database
      Returns:
      True if the role exists or False if it doesn't

    • existKey

      public Boolean existKey(String role, String employeeId)
      Verifies if a specific employee exist in the database
      Parameters:
      role - A String variable with the role of the wanted employee
      employeeId - A String variable with the unique id of the wanted employee
      Returns:
      True if the employee exists or False if it doesn't

    • getSurvey

      public String getSurvey()
      Gets the current survey of the manager
      Returns:
      A String variable that contains the survey

    • editSurvey

      public Boolean editSurvey(String newSurv, String employeeId)
      Updates the survey of a specific manager
      Parameters:
      newSurv - The String of the new survey that will replace the previous one
      employeeId - The unique id of the employee whose survey will be changed
      Returns:
      True if the survey was updated successfully or False if it wasn't

    • getSettings

      public Integer getSettings()
      Gets the manager settings from the Employee table
      Returns:
      An integer that represents the manager settings

    • editSettings

      public Boolean editSettings(Integer time_limit, String employeeId)
      Updates the manager settings for a specific employee
      Parameters:
      time_limit - An integer that represents the manager settings
      employeeId - The unique id of the employee whose setting will be changed
      Returns:
      True if the settings were updated successfully or False if they were not
